ygData.subject: RE: OMG!  GZ finally replied
ygData.msgSnippet: For now its only on the TEST SERVER. It will prolly port on the next patch. ... From: Alex Tan [mailto:atan@rhb.com.my] Sent: Friday, November 12, 1999 2:15 AM
ygData.messageBody:
For now its only on the TEST SERVER. It will prolly port on the next patch.

-----Original Message-----
From: Alex Tan [mailto:atan@...]
Sent: Friday, November 12, 1999 2:15 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] OMG! GZ finally replied


From: "Alex Tan" <atan@...>

Yes, I think selo's graphics has not changed.

----- Original Message -----
From: RaceFace <bean@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, November 12, 1999 12:57 PM
Subject: Re: [eqbards] OMG! GZ finally replied
